index_login.description_one:
Uhmm... isn’t just a chat app — it’s a decentralized hub for secure, real-time team collaboration. 
Built for Web3, made for you.
index_login.description_two:
Powered by blockchain, your messages stay encrypted, verified,
and tamper-proof - with data ownership in your hands.
index_login.description_three:
Designed for DAOs, startups, and global teams embracing decentralization.
Uhmm... is your all-in-one, future-proof communication layer.
